body: This iron pot may have a hook for hanging over a fire, but versions intended for traveling usually have three or four legs to let it stand over a fire. It holds approximately one gallon, and can be used for cooking, potion-making, and other similar activities.
name: Cauldron
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Gear/Goods and Services/Tools and Skill Kits/Cauldron
